Constructor Detail

StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel

public StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel()
The graph of this test's statistics. By default, the graph number is reset.

StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel

public StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel(StochasticKDTest.Stats stats)
The graph for a specific set of statistics. By default, the graph number is reset.

StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel

public StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel(boolean resetCount)
The graph of this test's statistics. If the resetCount parameter is set to false, then this graph is a subsequent graph and is overlaid on the prior graphs.

Parameters:
resetCount - false indicates a subsequent graph to the first
Method Detail

getGraphPanel

public javax.swing.JPanel getGraphPanel()
Get the graph panel to draw the graph into.

getYBuffer

public double getYBuffer()
Gets the number of pixels that should be added as white space to the top and bottom of the graph when calculating the scale of the graph. This value is inside the graph's frame and therefore reduces the amount of drawing space by twice its amount.

Specified by:
getYBuffer in interface GraphRedrawListener
Overrides:
getYBuffer in class TechnicalTestAbstract.GraphPanelAbstract
Returns:
The number of pixels to use at the top and bottom of the graph.

getTickSize

public double getTickSize()
Gets the size of a tick for the commodity being drawn. This keeps the scale of the graph in multiples of this tick size.

Specified by:
getTickSize in interface GraphRedrawListener
Overrides:
getTickSize in class TechnicalTestAbstract.GraphPanelAbstract
Returns:
The data's tick size.

redrawTitle

public boolean redrawTitle(java.awt.Graphics g,
                           int yOffset)
